vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the installation of water and wastewater mains at 24 locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - John Burns Construction Company of Texas, lowest responsible bidder of seven - Not to exceed $17,444,383.00 - Financing: Water (Drinking Water) - 2022 TWDB Fund ($9,891,963.00) and Wastewater (Clean Water) - 2022 TWDB Fund ($7,552,420.00)
